title: talkoncrypto Official
author: talkoncrypto Official
created_time: October 26, 2022, 05:26:33 AMLast edit: October 26, 2022, 06:22:07 AM by talkoncrypto Official
content: Now a days , people want to accept Bitcoins for various products and services ... such as Adding Members in Telegram Groups , or Posting/Promotion of any products on their verified Instagram, Twitter etc..Coinbaazar.com provides such a facility where people can accept bitcoins either through creating their offers, or just by generating an invoice which consist of a bitcoin wallet , and mentions all the details and receipts for accepting payments in bitcoins globally...All the trades are protected by escrow , so one can trade freely Moreover in anyways if the payment mode, product, or services if not listed to create offers .. one can always reach their chat support or can msg here ... it can be added to ensure that you can start earning bitcoins instantly..Its a platform where possibilities of earning bitcoins are endless ... DO YOU ALSO FINDING IT DIFFICULT TO REACH THE GLOBAL WORLD FOR SELLING OR BUYING PRODUCTS , SERVICES, ALTCOINS  VIA BITCOINS .. WAIT NO MORE ... AND SHARE YOUR OPINION...

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: I looked into their post history and yeah it's another coinbaazar sock puppet lol. Don't think people have forgotten about shilling you all did :'), see https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5271725.0

Anyways .. this is just a post ..we have seen may repeated post earlier ... but anyways ... its good you pointed out ... i just posted realizing .. the platform has been keeping advancements all the time .. and many new people join bitcointalk everyday ... so who remembers whats happened 2 years back .. people generally dont remember what they eaten 5 days back... moreover just read the other post and this one ... u will find the difference...
